name: Conductive
description:
This status starts with 2 stacks of Conductive. When attached again, Conductive stacks +1. Conductive can be stacked to a maximum of 4 stacks.
End Phase: Accumulate 1 stack of Conductive.

When the character attached with Conductive takes DMG from Violet Arc or Lightning Rose: Remove this status and DMG +1 for each stack of Conductive.
descriptionraw:
This status starts with 2 stacks of Conductive. When attached again, Conductive stacks +1. Conductive can be stacked to a maximum of 4 stacks.
<color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase: </color>Accumulate 1 stack of Conductive.
